title: Roosevelt Campobello International Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Grounds and Natural Area Open year round from 1/2 hour before sunrise to 1/2 hour after sunset. Visitor Center  Saturday following Victoria Day (the Saturday prior to U.S. Memorial Day) through Canadian Thanksgiving (U.S. Columbus Day) - 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. ADT (9 a.m. to 5 p.m. EDT) seven days a week. Canadian Thanksgiving (U.S. Columbus Day) through October 31 - 10 a.m. - 5 p.m. ADT (9 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. EDT) seven days a week  Roosevelt Cottage Saturday following Victoria Day (the Saturday prior to U.S. Memorial Day) through Canadian Thanksgiving (U.S. Columbus Day) - 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. ADT (9 a.m. to 5 p.m. EDT) seven days a week.
